import React from 'react' import {Row, Col, ListGroup, Button, Image, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import products from '../products' import Product from '../components/Product' const ProductScreen = () => { return (
{/* */}

{product.name}

${product.price}

 {product.description}
Status :
{product.countInStock > 0 ? `Only ${product.countInStock} left`: 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
